job.title: REMOTE Data Scientist
job.description: Come work as a Remote Data Scientist at one of the Top Company that offers exceptional benefits with opportunities to advance and learn alongside accomplished Technology leaders.              Important Note: This is 100% REMOTE position.  Must Have Skills:4+ years of hands-on experience in developing analytics with machine learning, deep learning, NLP, and/or other related modelling techniques3 - 5 years of experience using advanced data science tools such as R, Python, SQL, Spark and H2O3 - 5 years of experience developing and deploying analytic solutions using AWS or Azure or GCPExperience working with extremely large data sets Responsibilities:Research, Design, Implement and Deploy full-stack scalable machine learning solutions to support intelligent operations initiativesConduct hands-on data analysis and predictive analytics on large datasetsApply computational algorithms and statistical methods to structured and unstructured dataEffectively communicate complex technical results to business partnersSupport and drive analytic efforts around machine learning and innovationWork with a great deal of autonomy to find solutions to complex problemsCoach and mentor junior data scientists Benefits:Top industry payExcellent growth and advancement opportunities  Data Scientist
